53dabd7a-f667-4a41-8fcb-a011bd7df4f7.name: XG300 MEGA BASS™ Portable Bluetooth® Wireless Speaker
about_us: Super-light, portable design includes a retractable handle
IP67 rated for water and dust resistance2
X-Balanced speakers provide power, clarity, and distortion-free sound
Up to 25 hours of playing time, plus quick charging1
Personalized sound control via the Sony | Music Center app3
Charge your device via the USB port4
Stream wirelessly via BLUETOOTH® or via wired 3.5 mm jack3,5
The Fiestable app enhances the mood with cool effects3
Add to the fun with up to 100 compatible X-series speakers via Party Connect App3,7

All features: Sony brings you closer to the music and the artists you love. Watch exclusive videos and enter to win prizes only available for Sony fans.

Designed with the environment in mind

Sony is committed not only to offering products, services and content that deliver exciting experiences but also to working towards our goal of a zero environmental footprint throughout our business activities.

Power meets portability: Get super-portable sound to go. The XG300 wireless speaker plays as hard as you do, with up to 25 hours of battery life1 and IP67 water and dust resistance2. Its rich full sound and booming bass are perfect for when you want quality audio that goes wherever you go.
Life should be lived at full volume: That means getting your friends together, turning up the music to full volume and vibing all night to a clear, rich sound. With our X-Series range of speakers, you can make the most of every single moment, power parties you’ll remember forever, and always live your life out loud.
Retractable handle: The party can go wherever you go with the retractable handle, carefully designed to make the XG300 easier to carry.
Power and portability for your playlist: With a built-in handle and heavy-duty sound, the XG300 makes it easy to start the party anywhere
Robust IP67 Waterproof and dustproof des: From the beach to the park to the pool, the XG300 stands up to the elements with one of the highest ratings for protection from water and dust.2
Get extra power, clarity, and distortion: Instead of the traditional circular design, our unique diaphragm shape increases sound pressure for booming bass and distinctive, high-quality audio.
Give the bass a boost: MEGA BASS button on speakers allow you to really dial up the bass. So if you’re listening to something with a beat, you’ll get a deep and punchy bass sound.
Increasing sound pressure and reducing d: The unit’s non-circular shape not only maximizes the area of speaker diaphragm, increasing sound pressure for more punchy bass, it also reduces driver excursion while maintaining the same sound pressure, resulting in less distortion.
Let there be light: The lighting concept "Ambient Illumination" produces a modern, stylish and chic impression. Its illumination synchronises with music beats and fits to any lifestyle, including both party3 and daily use. The Illumination pattern can be set via the Sony | Music Center app, you can light up your party or room to completely fit your style.
Up to 25 hours battery: Up to 25 hours1 worth of battery when fully charged, the XG300 speaker will play and play, so you can keep on partying without worrying about the tunes suddenly stopping.
Charge up in a hurry: If you find yourself a little short of time, don't worry. Quick charging will give you up to 70 minutes of play on just a 10 minute charge.1
Take care of your battery: The Battery care feature helps you avoid overcharging and will keep your battery in optimum condition for longer.
Enjoy improved call quality with Echo Ca: Have better meetings and calls with Echo Canceling technology. This allows two people to talk at the same time without cutting either of them off.5
Bluetooth\u00ae connection and Fast Pair: In one tap, the Sony XG300 enables quick effortless Bluetooth® pairing with your Andorid® devices, as well as, multipoint connection that allows two devices to connect simultaneously.5
Get things booming with Party Connect: With Party Connect you can combine up to 100 compatible wireless speakers with BLUETOOTH® technology and sync your music so everyone dances to the same beat6. You can connect two speakers wirelessly for wider stereo sound. Both features are activated in the Sony | Music Center app.3
USB Type-C\u00ae and USB Type-A\u00ae po: The XG300 comes complete with a USB-C for battery charging and USB-A for charging another device.4
Sony | Music Center: Optimize audio settings, select playlist, cue the next song, and control Party Connect. Manage your devices right from your phone with the Sony | Music Center app.3
Fun features with Fiestable: Access fun features like making party playlists, karaoke, and so much more.3
Sustainability in mind: Our products are not only designed to be stylish, but also with the environment in mind. Plastic comprises less than 5% of the packaging material for the XG300, reflecting Sony's commitment to reducing the environmental impact of our products and practices.
Accessibility: We believe technology should make the world more interactive, more creative, more entertaining, and more inclusive. By incorporating human-centric, inclusive design into our audio products, we deliver our Kando experience to all our users, regardless of age, ability or environment.
